name: Children of the Gate
description:
Two people are stuck in a room together; one is trying to decide whether or not to kill the other.

In a world where humans are besieged by demons, two strangers must work together to survive. How are they ever going to trust each other when neither of them want to tell the whole truth?

This is a short kinetic novel. There are occasional bright flashes, flickering, and some blood.

Did you enjoy the story? Check out what else I'm doing!
